entry.title: FREEZING DRIZZLE ADVISORY , Ignace
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 04:23 AM CST Friday 30 December 2022

entry.title: Current Conditions: Cloudy, -9.4°C
entry.summary:

entry.title: Friday: Chance of flurries. High minus 10. POP 40%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 40 percent chance of flurries. Risk of freezing drizzle early this morning. Wind west 20 km/h becoming light near noon. High minus 10. Wind chill minus 20 this morning and minus 15 this afternoon. Forecast issued 05:30 AM CST Friday 30 December 2022

entry.title: Friday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 17. POP 30%
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. 30 percent chance of flurries early this evening. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 17. Wind chill minus 15 this evening and minus 24 overnight. Forecast issued 05:30 AM CST Friday 30 December 2022

entry.title: Saturday: A mix of sun and cloud. High minus 6.
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. Becoming cloudy in the afternoon. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 6. Wind chill minus 24 in the morning and minus 10 in the afternoon. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 05:30 AM CST Friday 30 December 2022
